actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Investigations.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should give top priority to redirecting resources transferred from U.S. European defense forces to the war on drugs, specifically by lending additional support to Department of Defense efforts at international drug interdiction and the establishment of up-to-date communication links between the agencies battling the flow of drugs into the nation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should redirect resources currently concentrated on European defenses toward international drug interdiction efforts.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should give top priority to redirecting resources transferred from U.S. European defense forces to the war on drugs, specifically by lending additional support to Department of Defense efforts at international drug interdiction and the establishment of up-to-date communication links between the agencies battling the flow of drugs into the nation.
